storyInfo: To obtain information on Sarkaz supply lines, Rhodes Island and the Self-Salvation Corps launch an attack on the Defense Force's command tower.

attributes.content: 9:37 A.M. \ Overcast
Near the City Defense Force Main Command Tower, Auchterigg District of Londinium
All Rhodes Island Spec Ops Team Amiya hands, as per our plan, we will work with the Self-Salvation Corps and launch an ambush on the Londinium Defense Force's command tower.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have only one objective: obtain the message logs from the defense system about the Sarkaz supply line.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: These messages will determine the success or failure of our entire Londinium operation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And that's... even if we most likely can no longer stop Theresis from declaring war on the dukes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But if we get our hands on this information, we'll have a chance to slow the pace of the war and reduce the sacrifices that come with it to a minimum.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We may have come well-prepared, but we need to expect the unexpected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All of us know in our hearts that, in the coming war, each battle will be more difficult than the last.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we came all this way for the same, unshakable goal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's time to keep going.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Amiya, we have another emergency on our hands.;Another Sarkaz King might appear on the battlefield.

attributes.content: Doctor, I know you're worried about me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can't say for sure that I'm ready... but ever since we left Sudean, I've been thinking what it will be like to see her again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If she stands opposite us, I want to know why. I want to feel... everything that she feels.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But just as I told the operators, I will never forget why we came here in the first place.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I understand very well that the future of the Sarkaz and the whole world that Theresa hoped for is slipping further and further away.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's exactly the future that I, Dr. Kal'tsit, and all the operators who came to Londinium with us hope for.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: For that, we are prepared to face anything, and we will fight each battle like it is our last.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right, Doctor. Let's go.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Sarkaz army has been quick to mobilize lately.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Yes, Lt. Colonel.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Everyone has been saying... saying...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Saying what?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: They've been saying that the Sarkaz are going to strike the dukes' forces soon. When that happens, they will throw us onto the battlefield as their cannon fodder.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: My apologies, Lt. Colonel. I've spoken out of turn.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: No, I don't blame you.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: We all trust you, sir. We all know how difficult it is to negotiate with the Sarkaz... but you've done it.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: All these years, it was you who kept us safe.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Even the time the Duke of Stafford revolted. If it wasn't for how accurate your judgment was, I would've been killed long ago by the rebels' cannonfire!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: You saved us time and again, and you protected this city from all sorts of conspiracies.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: As long as you're behind the decision, not one of us will question it.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: ...I know that.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: It's precisely because I know that...
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What's that sound in the streets down there?
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: It's the cargo track... They must be transporting construction material for the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: On guard!
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: —Good morning.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Wait, where did all these men come from?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Save your breath, unless you are willing to cough up the coin.
attributes.name: Victorian Mercenary

attributes.content: Mercenaries... Who sent you? Which duke?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We don't know any dukes, and they certainly wouldn't know us.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Are... Are you the rebels?
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We're the Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Self-... Salvation Corps...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: You know what this is about.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You should've been the ones fighting the Sarkaz, but you chose to raise the white flag. That left us no choice but to rise up ourselves.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Hold your ground! Don't let them into the tower!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Soldier.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: You're Victorian, aren't you?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: ...I am.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Twenty thousand Defense Forces men are stationed across the city.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Aside from those who were killed or captured, every last one of them is bound to the land they stand on by the same order, becoming an accessory to Sarkaz crimes.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: There is no way you are not aware that the Sarkaz will soon be launching a war on all of Victoria.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: When that time comes, will you still stand with the Sarkaz against your own friends and family?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Perhaps all you want is to survive. But you are not Sarkaz. You will never truly earn their trust. Once the war begins in earnest, they could abandon you at any moment.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I can see your hesitation. In the end, you are only footmen. It is the man who gives your orders, not you, who we must confront.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: So, stand aside.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Do not give ground. Not one of you! We will hold the line here!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We are soldiers. We trust our commander.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: We must follow our orders.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Lt. Colonel! The enemy is attacking the defensive line!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: No idea where or how they came, all of a sudden. Even if they snuck along the cargo track and managed to slip past the Sarkaz checkpoints on the surface, there's no way they could've gotten through the tower's surveillance system.
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Unless someone hacked the system and took down all the sentinels within a very short period of time...
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: But... That's impossible!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: I... er!
attributes.name: Victorian Soldier

attributes.content: Nothing is impossible.
A shadow flies toward him.
He can smell the scent of death. Unlike the sense of viscous suffocation he felt before the Sanguinarch of Vampires, he knows he will die a quick and relatively painless death.
Which is why he chose not to pointlessly attempt a dodge.
Nngh—!
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Out of my way!
...Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: So you've come after all.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Ascalon... How long has it been?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Nine days ago, when you barged into Westhaleg, were you also prepared to brandish the weapon the General bestowed upon you directly at him, as you are doing now?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: And, unlike you...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I will not hesitate.
attributes.name: Ascalon
